metadata.description:
"An all-new Mike Hammer story, developed from a never-before-seen 1950s screenplay by original creator Mickey Spillane, and written by Max Allan Collins, the writer of 'Road to Perdition' and 'Quarry'.

When a chance encounter with a captivating femme fatale leads to a violent mob retaliation, hard-boiled Detective Mike Hammer finds himself dodging both bullets and broads as he undertakes the most dangerous case of his career.
"
metadata.name: Mickey Spillane's Mike Hammer
